AutodefinedReverse.description: ResolverAutodefinedReverseStatus, possible values are ENABLING, ENABLED, DISABLING AND DISABLED.
AutodefinedReverse.markdownDescription:
ResolverAutodefinedReverseStatus, possible values are ENABLING, ENABLED, DISABLING AND DISABLED.

---

Required: No

Type: string     

Update requires: No interruption

AutodefinedReverseFlag.description: Represents the desired status of AutodefinedReverse. The only supported value on creation is DISABLE. Deletion of this resource will return AutodefinedReverse to its default value (ENABLED).
